abstract: NFL Roundup; league will begin streaming games worldwide in 2015 season as it seeks to increase broadcast revenue from consumers who do not pay for cable and satellite television; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. will stream the Buffalo Bills’ game against the Jacksonville Jaguars on Oct. 25 in London and explore streaming games on its website as a way to create more revenue.

headline.main: N.F.L. Will Stream Game From London Next Season

snippet: The N.F.L. will stream the Buffalo Bills’ game against the Jacksonville Jaguars on Oct. 25 in London and explore streaming games on its website as a way to create more revenue.
